00116 /* Hashtable used to cache stats, accessed by their IP addess */
00117 extern nfs_parameter_t    nfs_param ;
00118 unsigned int              expiration_time ;

00137 unsigned long int ip_stats_value_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00138 {
00139   return (unsigned long int)(buffclef->pdata) % p_hparam->index_size ;
00140 } /*  ip_stats_value_hash_func */
00141 
00142 
00159 unsigned long int ip_stats_rbt_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00160 {
00161   /* We use the Xid as the rbt value */
00162   return (unsigned long int)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00163 } /* ip_stats_rbt_hash_func */
00164 
00178 int compare_ip_stats(  hash_buffer_t * buff1, hash_buffer_t * buff2 )
00179 {
00180   unsigned long int xid1 = (unsigned long int)(buff1->pdata) ;
00181   unsigned long int xid2 = (unsigned long int)(buff2->pdata) ;
00182   return (xid1 == xid2)?0:1 ;
00183 } /* compare_xid */
00184 
00185 
00199 int display_ip_stats( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str ) 
00200 {
00201   unsigned long int ip_stats  = (unsigned long int)(pbuff->pdata) ;
00202   
00203   return sprintf( str, "%x : %d.%d.%d.%d", 
00204                   ip_stats, 
00205                   ( ip_stats & 0xFF000000 ) >> 24, 
00206                   ( ip_stats & 0x00FF0000 ) >> 16,
00207                   ( ip_stats & 0x0000FF00 ) >> 8,
00208                   ( ip_stats & 0x000000FF ) ) ;
00209 } /* display_ip_stats */

00211 
00227 int nfs_ip_stats_add(  hash_table_t   * ht_ip_stats,
00228                        unsigned         int ipaddr,
00229                        nfs_ip_stats_t * nfs_ip_stats_pool )
00230 
00231 {
00232   hash_buffer_t       buffkey  ;
00233   hash_buffer_t       buffdata ;
00234   nfs_ip_stats_t     * pnfs_ip_stats  = NULL ;
00235   struct hostent     * hp ;
00236   unsigned long int    local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00237   int                  length = sizeof( local_ipaddr ) ;
00238 
00239   /* Do nothing if configuration disables IP_Stats */ 
00240   if( nfs_param.core_param.dump_stats_per_client == 0 ) 
00241         return IP_STATS_SUCCESS ;
00242 
00243 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00244   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00245   BuddySetDebugLabel( "nfs_ip_stats_t" ) ;
00246 #endif
00247 
00248   /* Entry to be cached */
00249   GET_PREALLOC( pnfs_ip_stats, 
00250                 nfs_ip_stats_pool, 
00251                 nfs_param.worker_param.nb_ip_stats_prealloc, 
00252                 nfs_ip_stats_t, 
00253                 next_alloc ) ;
00254 
00255 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00256   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00257   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00258 #endif
00259 
00260   if( pnfs_ip_stats == NULL ) 
00261     return IP_STATS_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00262   
00263   /* I have to keep an integer as key, I wil use the pointer buffkey->pdata for this, 
00264    * this also means that buffkey->len will be 0 */
00265   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ; 
00266   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00267 
00268 
00269   /* I build the data with the request pointer that should be in state 'IN USE' */
00270   pnfs_ip_stats->nb_call     = 0 ;
00271   pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_nfs2 = 0 ;
00272   pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_nfs3 = 0 ;
00273   pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_nfs4 = 0 ;
00274   pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_mnt1 = 0 ;
00275   pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_mnt3 = 0 ;
00276 
00277   memset( pnfs_ip_stats->req_mnt1, 0, MNT_V1_NB_COMMAND*sizeof( int ) ) ;
00278   memset( pnfs_ip_stats->req_mnt3, 0, MNT_V3_NB_COMMAND*sizeof( int ) ) ;
00279   memset( pnfs_ip_stats->req_nfs2, 0, NFS_V2_NB_COMMAND*sizeof( int ) ) ;
00280   memset( pnfs_ip_stats->req_nfs3, 0, NFS_V3_NB_COMMAND*sizeof( int ) ) ;
00281 
00282   buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_ip_stats ;
00283   buffdata.len = sizeof( nfs_ip_stats_t ) ;
00284   
00285   if( HashTable_Set( ht_ip_stats, &buffkey, &buffdata ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00286     return IP_STATS_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00287   
00288   return IP_STATS_SUCCESS ; 
00289 } /* nfs_ip_stats_add */
00290 
00302 int  nfs_ip_stats_incr( hash_table_t   * ht_ip_stats, 
00303                         unsigned int     ipaddr, 
00304                         unsigned int     nfs_prog,
00305                         unsigned int     mnt_prog,
00306                         struct svc_req * ptr_req )
00307 {
00308   hash_buffer_t         buffkey ;
00309   hash_buffer_t         buffval ;
00310   int                   status ;
00311   unsigned long int     local_ipaddr = ipaddr ; 
00312   nfs_ip_stats_t      * pnfs_ip_stats ;
00313   
00314   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ;
00315   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00316   
00317   /* Do nothing if configuration disables IP_Stats */ 
00318   if( nfs_param.core_param.dump_stats_per_client == 0 ) 
00319         return IP_STATS_SUCCESS ;
00320 
00321   if( HashTable_Get( ht_ip_stats, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00322     {
00323       pnfs_ip_stats = (nfs_ip_stats_t *)buffval.pdata ;
00324       pnfs_ip_stats->nb_call += 1 ;
00325 
00326       status = IP_STATS_SUCCESS ;
00327 
00328       if( ptr_req->rq_prog == nfs_prog )
00329         {
00330           switch( ptr_req->rq_vers )
00331             {
00332             case NFS_V2:
00333               pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_nfs2 +=1 ;
00334               pnfs_ip_stats->req_nfs2[ptr_req->rq_proc] += 1 ;
00335               break ;
00336               
00337              case NFS_V3:
00338               pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_nfs3 +=1 ;
00339               pnfs_ip_stats->req_nfs3[ptr_req->rq_proc] += 1 ;
00340               break ;
00341               
00342             case NFS_V4:
00343               pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_nfs4 += 1 ;
00344               break ;
00345             }
00346         }
00347       else if(  ptr_req->rq_prog == mnt_prog )
00348         {
00349            switch( ptr_req->rq_vers )
00350             {
00351             case MOUNT_V1:
00352               pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_mnt1 +=1 ;
00353               pnfs_ip_stats->req_mnt1[ptr_req->rq_proc] += 1 ;
00354               break ;
00355               
00356             case MOUNT_V3:
00357               pnfs_ip_stats->nb_req_mnt3 +=1 ;
00358               pnfs_ip_stats->req_mnt3[ptr_req->rq_proc] += 1 ;
00359               break ;
00360             }
00361         }
00362     }
00363   else
00364     {
00365       status = IP_STATS_NOT_FOUND ;
00366     }
00367   return status ;
00368 } /* nfs_ip_stats_incr */
00369 
00381 int  nfs_ip_stats_get( hash_table_t     * ht_ip_stats, 
00382                        unsigned int       ipaddr, 
00383                        nfs_ip_stats_t  ** pnfs_ip_stats )
00384 {
00385   hash_buffer_t        buffkey ;
00386   hash_buffer_t        buffval ;
00387   unsigned long int    local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00388   int                  status ;
00389   
00390   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ;
00391   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00392   
00393   /* Do nothing if configuration disables IP_Stats */ 
00394   if( nfs_param.core_param.dump_stats_per_client == 0 ) 
00395         return IP_STATS_SUCCESS ;
00396 
00397   if( HashTable_Get( ht_ip_stats, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00398     {
00399       *pnfs_ip_stats = (nfs_ip_stats_t *)buffval.pdata ;
00400 
00401       status =  IP_STATS_SUCCESS ;
00402     }
00403   else
00404     {
00405       status = IP_STATS_NOT_FOUND ;
00406     }
00407   return status ;
00408 } /* nfs_ip_stats_get */

00410 
00411 
00424 int nfs_ip_stats_remove( hash_table_t   * ht_ip_stats, 
00425                          int              ipaddr, 
00426                          nfs_ip_stats_t * nfs_ip_stats_pool )
00427 {
00428   hash_buffer_t        buffkey , old_value ;
00429   int                  status = IP_STATS_SUCCESS;
00430   hash_data_t        * pdata = NULL ;
00431   nfs_ip_stats_t     * pnfs_ip_stats  = NULL ;
00432   unsigned long int   long_ipaddr ; 
00433  
00434   long_ipaddr = (unsigned long int)ipaddr ;
00435 
00436   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)long_ipaddr ; 
00437   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00438 
00439   /* Do nothing if configuration disables IP_Stats */ 
00440   if( nfs_param.core_param.dump_stats_per_client == 0 ) 
00441         return IP_STATS_SUCCESS ;
00442 
00443    if( HashTable_Del( ht_ip_stats, &buffkey, NULL, &old_value ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00444     {
00445       pnfs_ip_stats = (nfs_ip_stats_t *)old_value.pdata ;
00446       RELEASE_PREALLOC( pnfs_ip_stats, nfs_ip_stats_pool, next_alloc ) ;
00447     }
00448   else
00449     {
00450       status = IP_STATS_NOT_FOUND ;
00451     }
00452 
00453    return status ;
00454 } /* nfs_ip_stats_remove */

00457 
00469 hash_table_t * nfs_Init_ip_stats( nfs_ip_stats_parameter_t  param ) 
00470 { 
00471   hash_table_t * ht_ip_stats ;
00472   
00473   if( ( ht_ip_stats = HashTable_Init( param.hash_param  ) ) == NULL )
00474     {
00475       DisplayLog( "NFS IP_STATS: Cannot init IP stats cache" ) ;
00476       return NULL ;
00477     }
00478 
00479   return  ht_ip_stats ;
00480 } /* nfs_Init_ip_stats */

00482 
00493 void nfs_ip_stats_dump( hash_table_t   ** ht_ip_stats,
00494                         unsigned int      nb_worker, 
00495                         char            * path_stat)
00496 {
00497   struct rbt_node    * it;
00498   struct rbt_head    * tete_rbt ;
00499   hash_data_t        * pdata = NULL ;
00500   unsigned int         i = 0 ;
00501   unsigned int         j = 0 ;
00502   unsigned int         k = 0 ;
00503   nfs_ip_stats_t     * pnfs_ip_stats[NB_MAX_WORKER_THREAD] ;
00504   nfs_ip_stats_t       ip_stats_aggreg ;
00505   char                 ifpathdump[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00506   unsigned long int    ipaddr ; 
00507   time_t               current_time ;
00508   struct tm            current_time_struct ;
00509   char                 strdate[1024] ;
00510   FILE               * flushipstat = NULL ; 
00511 
00512   /* Do nothing if configuration disables IP_Stats */ 
00513   if( nfs_param.core_param.dump_stats_per_client == 0 ) 
00514         return  ;
00515 
00516   /* Compute the current time */
00517   current_time = time( NULL ) ;
00518   memcpy( &current_time_struct, localtime( &current_time ), sizeof( current_time_struct ) ) ;
00519   snprintf( strdate, 1024, "%u, %.2d/%.2d/%.4d %.2d:%.2d:%.2d ",
00520             (unsigned int)current_time,
00521             current_time_struct.tm_mday,
00522             current_time_struct.tm_mon+1,
00523             1900 + current_time_struct.tm_year,
00524             current_time_struct.tm_hour,
00525             current_time_struct.tm_min,
00526             current_time_struct.tm_sec ) ;
00527 
00528   /* All clients are supposed to have call at least one time worker #0 
00529    * we loop on every client in the HashTable */
00530   for( i = 0 ; i < ht_ip_stats[0]->parameter.index_size ; i++ )
00531    {
00532       tete_rbt = &((ht_ip_stats[0]->array_rbt)[i]) ;
00533       RBT_LOOP( tete_rbt, it )
00534         {
00535           pdata = (hash_data_t *)it->rbt_opaq ;
00536 
00537           ipaddr =  (unsigned long int)pdata->buffkey.pdata ;
00538 
00539           snprintf( ifpathdump, 
00540                     MAXPATHLEN, 
00541                     "%s/stats_nfs-0x%x=%u.%u.%u.%u", 
00542                     path_stat, 
00543                     ntohl( ipaddr ),
00544                     ( ntohl( ipaddr ) & 0xFF000000 ) >> 24,
00545                     ( ntohl( ipaddr ) & 0x00FF0000 ) >> 16,
00546                     ( ntohl( ipaddr ) & 0x0000FF00 ) >> 8,
00547                     ( ntohl( ipaddr ) & 0x000000FF ) ) ;
00548 
00549          if( ( flushipstat = fopen( ifpathdump, "a" ) ) == NULL )
00550            return ;
00551 
00552          /* Collect stats for each worker and aggregate them*/
00553          memset( &ip_stats_aggreg, 0, sizeof( ip_stats_aggreg ) ) ;
00554          for( j = 0 ; j < nb_worker ; j++ )  
00555            {
00556              if( nfs_ip_stats_get( ht_ip_stats[j], 
00557                                    ipaddr, 
00558                                    &pnfs_ip_stats[j] ) != IP_STATS_SUCCESS )
00559                 return ;
00560              ip_stats_aggreg.nb_call += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->nb_call ;
00561 
00562              ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs2 += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->nb_req_nfs2 ;
00563              ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs3 += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->nb_req_nfs3 ;
00564              ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs4 += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->nb_req_nfs4 ;
00565              ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_mnt1 += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->nb_req_mnt1 ;
00566              ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_mnt3 += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->nb_req_mnt3  ;
00567 
00568              for( k = 0 ; k < MNT_V1_NB_COMMAND ; k++ ) 
00569                 ip_stats_aggreg.req_mnt1[k] += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->req_mnt1[k] ;
00570 
00571              for( k = 0 ; k < MNT_V3_NB_COMMAND ; k++ )
00572                 ip_stats_aggreg.req_mnt3[k] += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->req_mnt3[k] ;
00573 
00574               for( k = 0 ; k < NFS_V2_NB_COMMAND ; k++ )
00575                 ip_stats_aggreg.req_nfs2[k] += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->req_nfs2[k] ;
00576 
00577               for( k = 0 ; k < NFS_V3_NB_COMMAND ; k++ )
00578                 ip_stats_aggreg.req_nfs3[k] += (pnfs_ip_stats[j])->req_nfs3[k] ;
00579            }
00580 
00581           /* Write stats to file */
00582           fprintf( flushipstat, "NFS/MOUNT STATISTICS,%s;%u|%u,%u,%u,%u,%u\n",
00583                    strdate,
00584                    ip_stats_aggreg.nb_call,
00585                    ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_mnt1,
00586                    ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_mnt3,
00587                    ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs2,
00588                    ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs3,
00589                    ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs4 ) ;
00590                    
00591          fprintf( flushipstat, "MNT V1 REQUEST,%s;%u|", strdate, ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_mnt1 ) ;
00592          for( k = 0 ; k < MNT_V1_NB_COMMAND-1 ; k++ )
00593            fprintf( flushipstat, "%u," , ip_stats_aggreg.req_mnt1[k] ) ;
00594          fprintf( flushipstat, "%u\n" , ip_stats_aggreg.req_mnt1[MNT_V1_NB_COMMAND-1] );
00595                    
00596          fprintf( flushipstat, "MNT V3 REQUEST,%s;%u|", strdate, ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_mnt3 ) ;
00597          for( k = 0 ; k < MNT_V3_NB_COMMAND-1 ; k++ )
00598            fprintf( flushipstat, "%u," , ip_stats_aggreg.req_mnt3[k] );
00599          fprintf( flushipstat, "%u\n" , ip_stats_aggreg.req_mnt3[MNT_V3_NB_COMMAND-1] );
00600           
00601          fprintf( flushipstat, "NFS V2 REQUEST,%s;%u|", strdate, ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs2 ) ;
00602          for( k = 0 ; k < NFS_V2_NB_COMMAND-1 ; k++ )
00603            fprintf( flushipstat, "%u," , ip_stats_aggreg.req_nfs2[k] ) ;
00604          fprintf( flushipstat, "%u\n" , ip_stats_aggreg.req_nfs2[NFS_V2_NB_COMMAND-1] );
00605                   
00606          fprintf( flushipstat, "NFS V3 REQUEST,%s;%u|", strdate, ip_stats_aggreg.nb_req_nfs3 ) ;
00607          for( k = 0 ; k < NFS_V3_NB_COMMAND-1 ; k++ )
00608            fprintf( flushipstat, "%u," , ip_stats_aggreg.req_nfs3[k] ) ;
00609          fprintf( flushipstat, "%u\n" , ip_stats_aggreg.req_nfs3[NFS_V3_NB_COMMAND-1] );
00610 
00611          fprintf( flushipstat, "END, ----- NO MORE STATS FOR THIS PASS ----\n" ) ;
00612 
00613          fflush( flushipstat ) ;
00614 
00615          /* Check next client */
00616          RBT_INCREMENT(it);
00617        }
00618     }
00619 } /* nfs_ip_stats_dump */
Generated on Wed Apr 9 08:24:40 2008 for Support routines layer by  1.3.9.1
